Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>President Yunobo wants for everyone to
enjoy the use of the mine carts.

But please stay safe if you do use them!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Now that I think about it, I haven't seen
Mota around at all lately...
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>He shoulda been workin' at that mining
site, but he hasn't been showin' up.
Not even for lunches.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Even us workers, who're used to hazards,
have to be careful around here. Anything
can happen.
So take extra care when you're walking
around this area.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Eating_00>Mine carts 'n' <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Can't stop 'em, won't stop 'em.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Arrogant_01>What're ya doin'!<sp:5:1:0> That's MY marbled
rock roast!

Ya gotta take special care to grill it over
an open flame.<sp:5:0:0> Makes the outside all
crunchy<sp:5:1:0> and the inside all chewy.
I'm in the middle of making the greatest
food experience ever here. No touching!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I guess<sp:5:0:0> it's no surprise he's missing. He
was eating tons of marbled rock roastâ€”
probably wandered off while munchin'.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Arrogant_00>Look, I TOLD you not to touch!


I'm tryin' to grill this<sp:5:1:0> so the outside's
all crunchy and the inside's all chewy.

And to do that, I need things JUST as
they are.
